subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Group Session, What's your thoughts!
author: Lisby
full_text:
On Jan 2, 2008, at 9:06 AM, juli velazquez wrote:

>
> Thanks Ann, I'm trying.
>
> I would like to set up a group participation for a group session in  
> this up and coming month.  I would like to get a series of  
> questions together and have everyone with the same box's do a  
> session at the same time using these questions.

Might be interested. I'm game.


>
> It would be interesting to see what we all get as well as if some  
> of the same voices come through for all of us.
>
> I know I have heard Steve come through when we were doing a session  
> at the same time, and his and Bruces tecs voices have been verified  
> by them and have come through to verify things if I had a problem  
> during my sessions.

When you say this--you're referring to Steve's technicians or guides  
or whatever you want to call his regulars, right? Or is this a spirit  
Steve?

I've been steadily hearing "Seven," "Lisa," "Rick," and "Steve" on my  
end. Today I heard from someone named Charlotte twice.

Ann
